description:
Neema`s father takes her on a tour of their northern lands, where unusual monsters have been appearing in the forest and causing problems for the locals lately.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les monstres de la forêt sont surprenants
Mori no Mamono de Bikkuri Desu!
Surprised by the Monsters in the Forest!
森の魔物でびっくりです!
